data.title: Dedicated to Old School Gaming Fans (Old Gamepro TV Episodes Inside)
data.meta_description:
The below are old episodes of "Gamepro TV" ..I thought you guys who enjoy classic gaming like me, would enjoy watching these episodes. :) 

The description...
data.text:
The below are old episodes of "Gamepro TV" ..I thought you guys who enjoy classic gaming like me, would enjoy watching these episodes.

The description for each youtube episode is below the link! No I did not upload these!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QOZ7W94XeeE

GamePro TV Episode 1 - "Mag-net-o" Edition

Most likely not the "first" episode of GamePro, but it is the first one I recorded way back in 1991 when I was but a wee lad. Tons of classic footage of NES tips and cheats, Super Ghouls and Ghosts, Game Gear and Sega CD previews, Wolverine eating burgers, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles and Castlevania for the Game Boy and more! No one else seems to have this show on tape, so enjoy its Net debut!

I recorded many episodes of this series from its original 1991-1992 run, the only season of GamePro TV ever produced. And I plan to show more in the future!

Stay tuned to Siliconera.com for import game coverage and for future episodes of GamePro!

And thanks to GamePro for creating such an awesome/cheesy show!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0zw45mFfTY0

GamePro TV Episode 2 - "'Sup!" Edition

Here's the second recorded episode of GamePro TV!

SWAT: The Rocketeer - NES, Shadowgate - NES, The Immortal - Genesis, Battletoads - NES, Batman - GameBoy, Gain Ground - Genesis

Ask The Pros: The Immortal - Genesis

Pro Review: Bucky O'Hare - NES

The Cutting Edge: Game Action Replay - NES

16 Bit Hits: John Madden Football - SNES

Viewer SWAT: Star Trek - NES

There is one missing clip, a preview of Eco-Quest for PC, but I recorded over it and the video was unwatchable, so I didn't include it.

Stay tuned for more GamePro TV!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DQMTXgTraKg

GamePro TV Episode 3 - "Do Me So Far, Do Me" Edition!

Here's the third recorded episode of GamePro TV!

Sadly, this and future episodes of GPTV are without Brennan "B-man" Howard as co-host. Guess the surfer speak didn't quite hold up. Also, due to a memory lapse (hey, this stuff aired 14 years ago, ok?) I can't remember if the show either went on haitus for a few months during the holidays or if I just missed a bunch of episodes, because this show apparently aired in February 1992, and the previous episodes I posted were from late 1991.

Either way, it's all here, so enjoy!

SWAT: S.C.A.T. - NES, Super Mario World - SNES, Bonk's Revenge - TG16, Play Action Football - NES

Ask The Pros: StarTropics - NES

Pro Review: Mega Man IV - NES

Inside Info: Top 10 NES Video Game Rentals Feb. 1992 - Blockbuster Video, Final Fight (Ending) - SNES, Medieval History - Check your local library!

16 Bit Hits: Joe Montana Sports Talk Football - Genesis

Stay tuned for more GamePro TV!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QfM6SSJpPKA

GamePro TV Episode 4 - "Cheese Bridge and Soda Lake" Edition

NOTE: When I label these videos "Episode 4" and such, I don't mean it is the actual fourth episode of GamePro TV produced. It just means that it's the fourth episode I recorded. Unless GamePro decides to put up episodes of their TV show on their Web site, or if someone else has a more complete collection of episodes than I do, then I will continue to label them as "1, 2, 3, etc." up until the very last episode posted. And I still got a few hours left on the video tape, so there's more episodes to come!

... but, yeah, there's still no B-man in the other eps. I must've missed a big chunk of episodes featuring him. Please tell me someone else recorded this show!

SWAT: Battletoads - NES, Gradius III - SNES, Castlevania 2 - Game Boy, Super Mario World - SNES, Low G Man - NES

Ask the Pros: Bionic Commando - NES

Pro Review: Treasure Master - NES

Inside Info: Top 10 NES Video Game Rentals Feb. 1992 - Blockbuster Video, Ninja Gaiden III (Ending) - NES

16 Bit Hits: Super Adventure Island - SNES

Viewer SWAT: Legend of Zelda - NES

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Um-y00_qd2c

GamePro TV Episode 5 - "THECRUSHEL" Edition

SWAT: ToeJam & Earl - Genesis, Mega Man IV - NES, Super Castlevania IV - SNES, Bonk's Revenge - TG16, Devil's Crush - TG16, El Viento - Genesis

Ask The Pros: Bill & Ted's Excellent Video Game Adventure - NES

Pro Review: Tiny Toon Adventures - NES

16 Bit Hits: Lemmings - SNES

Inside Info: Top 10 NES Video Game Rentals Feb. 1992 - Blockbuster Video

Viewer SWAT: Turrican - Genesis

Also, apparently this show is "2 legit" (you'll see at the end of the episode).

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=msJ_ynFvcTA

GamePro TV Episode 6 - "007 373 5963" Edition

SWAT: Treasure Master - NES, Aero Blasters - TG16, Powerball - Genesis, Super Mario World - SNES, Maniac Mansion - NES, Operation C - Game Boy

Ask the Pros: Dragon Warrior - NES

Pro Review: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III: The Manhattan Project - NES

16 Bit Hits: Smash TV - SNES

Inside Info: Top 10 NES Video Game Rentals Feb. 1992 - Blockbuster Video, Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! - NES, Captain Planet and the Planeteers (plus a lecture about environmental awareness from J.D. Roth) - NES

Viewer SWAT: Super Castlevania IV - SNES
